abstract: The United Nations’ top food and agriculture official said Monday that the world food supply is dwindling and that food prices are soaring to historic levels.
snippet: The United Nations’ top food and agriculture official said Monday that the world food supply is dwindling and that food prices are soaring to historic levels.
lead_paragraph: ROME  In an “unforeseen and unprecedented” shift, the world food supply is dwindling rapidly and food prices are soaring to historic levels, the United Nations’ top food and agriculture official warned Monday.

headline.main: World Food Supply Is Shrinking, U.N. Agency Warns
headline.print_headline: World Food Supply Is Shrinking, U.N. Agency Warns
